posts.post_content:
This is the worst installment of an irrelevant cycle that took too long to be made even more irrelevant by a second, terrible cycle, which is now also irrelevant.  
  
The only thing I can think of that it has going for it is that it's almost always better than [Rakalite](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Rakalite).  
  
ALMOST always.  
  
Oh yeah, and the flavor text is stupid.  
  
Can you tell how much I like this card?
